name: shattuckstreet
tag_list: healthcare, health, health-information-technology, clinical-trials, electronic-health-records, electronic-medical-records
overview:
Shattuckstreet is a health information technology company that allows physicians to participate in clinical research, including clinical trials. Clinical research is not only done to finding the next “blockbuster” drug, but also to contribute invaluable information about the benefits and safety of existing therapies, providing doctors and patients with reliable information for choosing between alternative treatments.

While pharmaceutical/Medical device/Biotechnology industry spends ~$100B on clinical trials, they incur annual losses to the tune of ~$10B due to poor recruitment of subjects, despite outsourcing to India and China. Shattuck Street is a Health Information Technology company that facilitates physician’s participation in industry sponsored clinical trials and collaborate with physicians from prestigious institutes through our proprietary platform called Physician Assisted Patient Education Research Systems (PAPERS™). This health portal solves major problems that are daunting health care system improving the quality of healthcare through integrating time, communication and information for both patients and physicians. status: Beta; ready for the end-users
